I will say it again....

I am Denzel Moises Echevarria

With a strong affinity for technology I dove head first into the community, traveling to participate in events with the goal of growing my community presence and developing my skillset. Having formed strong bonds through the community I became an internet personality on streaming platforms, merging different communities with my own.

While using OBS I grew intrigued by web extensions, manipulating my stream overlays for a professional aesthetic. The knowledge gained allowed me to give back to the community and aid others to improve their streaming quality. After a while I found myself interested in open source software, and before I knew I was diving into web development, ready to share my personality and spread joy to my surroundings.
